EmailTemplate.description: [subject line A] Connecting the World with Cash [subject line B] Video: Learn more about NCR’s latest cash dispenser https://www.ncr.com/selfserv21
EmailTemplate.name: 08-02-22 BNK SelfServ 21 SEA Email 1.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Connecting the World with Cash
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Whether they prefer cash, cards or digital, consumers want choices when it comes to making payments. In order to win and keep their business, you’ll need to meet and even exceed their demands. NCR’s new compact lobby cash dispenser does just that—through an exceptional customer experience. Built for the banking customer of today and tomorrow, the new NCR SelfServ 21 is designed to offer a modern experience with enhanced security and high ATM availability. Watch our video to find out how NCR’s SelfServ 21 can help improve your self-service network. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
